name: The Dakota Hat KNITTING PATTERN
description:
A simple pattern for a hat, using a cool ribbing called Farrow Rib.  This pattern is easy to follow, and knit in the round using circular needles and double pointed needles.  You need to know the basics such as the knit stitch, the purl stitch, how to knit in the round, decreasing and using double-pointed needles.

Pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours of purchase!

thanks!!

name: Pearl and Leather Lariat Light Copper
description:
Another piece inspired by a much higher-priced designer item...11-12 mm baroque pearls are hand-knotted onto supple Greek Leather Cord.

Wear it knotted once and hanging long, or you can wrap it several times around the neck for a choker, or even wrap around your wrist for a bracelet.  You can probably even pull this off as a belt, or headband!

Easy, and so very wearable...great summer style, or equally as lovely on a winter sweater.

Shipping, as always, is included in the price.
